receiver

Interface MoteurEditeur

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MoteurImpl

    public interface MoteurEditeur
    This is the interface that an engine must implement to execute the enregistrable commands.
    Author:
    Carlos Pérez carlosinftech

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void coller()
      Pastes the contents of the clipboard into the buffer
      void copier()
      Copies the contents of the selection into the clipboard.
      void couper()
      Removes the context of the selection from the Buffer and pastes the contents into the clipboard
      void decrementerDebut()
      Decreases the visible cursor une position
      void decrementerFin()
      Decreases the selection cursor one position (Selection is defined as characters between visible cursor and selection cursor)
      void effacerApres()
      Deletes the character following the initial cursor
      void effacerAvant()
      Deletes the character previous to the initial cursor
      void incrementerDebut()
      Increases the visible cursor one position
      void incrementerFin()
      Increases the selection cursor one position (Selection is defined as characters between visible cursor and selection cursor)
      void insererCaractere(char c)
      Inserts the character received into the buffer
      void resetBuffer()
      Sets the buffer to its original state by removing all text and returning the cursors to their original positions.
